Hi Alex,

 

Hope you had a good weekend. Thank you for sharing the draft.

 

Just a few questions from our end for a final clarification before we send the contract over to our partner in KSA for signature.

 

*	Clause 6.2 - Title and risk in the Products shall remain with the Company until they are purchased on the Platform, after which it shall pass to the customer. 

	*	How does this work, as the products will be physically present in your warehouse. Is there a shrinkage clause that we can add perhaps?

*	10 INSURANCE - The Company shall at its own cost and expense take out and keep in force and effect throughout the Term applicable insurance policies for the Products as required for the performance of its obligations under this Agreement.
